title: HAP 72 - In A Class of Their Own - Early African American Socialism
itunes:title: HAP 72 - In A Class of Their Own - Early African American Socialism
description: Around the time of World War One, Hubert Harrison, A. Philip Randolph, and other black socialists argue that racial oppression is caused by capitalism.
